Package ir.ceno.controller

Class CategoryController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ir.ceno.controller.CategoryController

  • @Controller
@RequestMapping("/categories")
public class CategoryController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller that deals with category-related operations.

    Requests to urls starting with /categories are dispatched here.

    • Method Detail

      • showCategoryPosts

        @GetMapping("/{category}")
public java.lang.String showCategoryPosts​(@PathVariable
                                          java.lang.String category,
                                          org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Gets latest posts for the specified category and adds them to the model.
        Parameters:
        category - name of the category to get its posts
        model - the model to add attributes to
        Returns:
        view name of the category page

      • getCategorySlice

        @GetMapping("/{category}/slice")
public java.lang.String getCategorySlice​(@PathVariable
                                         java.lang.String category,
                                         @RequestParam
                                         java.lang.Integer sliceNumber,
                                         org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Returns one slice of the specified category.

        E.g. if the slice size is 10 and the given sliceNumber is 3, then posts 31 to 40 will be returned (if available) according to the underlying sort strategy.

        Parameters:
        category - name of the category to get its slice
        sliceNumber - zero-based slice number
        model - the model to add attributes to
        Returns:
        fragment of the view to be built as slice

      • deleteCategory

        @PostMapping("/delete")
@ResponseBody
public void deleteCategory​(@RequestParam
                           long postId,
                           @RequestParam
                           java.lang.String catName,
                           org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
        Deletes the category from the specified post.
        Parameters:
        postId - id of the post to delete its category
        catName - name of the category to be deleted
        authentication - security authentication to check if the user is authenticated

      • addCategory

        @PostMapping("/add")
@ResponseBody
public void addCategory​(@RequestParam
                        long postId,
                        @RequestParam
                        java.lang.String catName,
                        org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
        Adds the category to the specified post.
        Parameters:
        postId - id of the post to add category to
        catName - name of the category to be added
        authentication - security authentication to check if the user is authenticated
